constituent: sign of the dragon, cliff, two, hairpin, safety-pin
koohiiStory1: I'm going with the Mortal Kombat Symbol, as it's the closest thing to a sign of the dragon I know. In that game, there's a place called the pit to which you can throw your opponent on round two, but only with a hairpin punch.
koohiiStory2: The kid said "I don´t believe you! Dragons don´t exist!" so we made a little surprise for him: we pinned a huge dragon (it was just a sign really) on a nearby cliff. "Whoaaa! Dragon!" the kid said. "But why won´t it move?" "I tell you why, cause it´s pinned there with two hairpins" I thought to myself.
